item.title: Code Help
item.content:encoded:
To solve existing problems:

Image

I guess you are trying to insert an image here:

 [[image source="VICE KAI.png"]]

Extern Images

To use an image outside this wiki use this code:

 [[image imageadress/Image_Name.filetype]]

Example:

 [[image http://bvs.wdfiles.com/local--files/allies:billy/Billy.gif]]

Intern Images

For images in this wiki you can also use

 [[image category:imagepage/Image_Name.filetype]]

Example: 
 [[image allies:stalkergirl/Stalkergirl.gif]]

Heading

When making headings the order is important
The heading code must always be first.

so this won't work:

 **+ Little known facts:**

The heading must allways start with a + like:

 + Heading Title 1 ++ Heading Title 2 +++ Heading Title 3 ++++ Heading Title 4 +++++ Heading Title 5

Example:

Heading Title 1

Heading Title 2

Heading Title 3

Heading Title 4

Heading Title 5

and if you want to spice up the text in the heading you have only alter the text (not the heading code) like this:

 ++ **Bold Heading**

Example:

Bold Heading

Numbered list

What you are trying to do here, I guess, is to make a numbered list:

 #He actually shares a name with one of his allies. #--His village was Godly Mech village. (Join never.)-- #You may know him as "Venus" #He really is a ninja, and McM kicked him out of Hammergirl, which is the equivalent of the sun, therefore beating Gyoshido to the Punch.

Codes like headings and lists allways need to have a space between the code and the text like:

 # Item 1 # Item 2 # Item 3

Example:

  1. Item 1
  2. Item 2
  3. Item 3




If there are more you would like to know, speciefy what and then I can try to help
